DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study assess efficacy dose-response relationship ASP1707 reduction endometriosis associate pelvic pain . The secondary objective assess safety , tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ASP1707 , dose response relationship ASP1707 reduction E2 ( Estradiol ) , 24-week efficacy ASP1707 reduction endometriosis associate pain 24-week safety tolerability ASP1707 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effectiveness Safety Different Doses ASP1707 Compared Placebo Endometriosis Associated Pelvic Pain
